Action.description: A read-only plugin action that either represents a file download or an arbitrary invocation performed by the plugin.

download.description: Whether this action will trigger a download or invoke an internal action that will return a string result.

invocationRef.description: Whether this action will trigger a download or invoke an internal action that will return a string result.

ActionDescriptor.description: Describes an arbitrary action that is available for a plugin.

download.description: Whether this action will trigger a download or invoke an internal action that will return a string result.

downloadContentType.description: If this is a download, this is the Content-Type of the downloaded file. Otherwise, this is null.

downloadFileName.description: If this is a download, this is the suggested file name of the downloaded file. Otherwise, this is null.

ActionResult.description: The result for non-download plugin actions.

message.description: The message from the completed action.

Actions.description: A read-only list of available actions for this plugin instance.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

BaseSelectionFieldDescriptor.description: Holds fields that are shared by all selection-type field descriptors.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

optionValues.description: The list of option values for this selection field.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

CheckBoxFieldDescriptor.description: A boolean field typically rendered as a checkbox in a configuration UI.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

encryptedValue.description: For encrypted or hashed fields, this attribute contains the encrypted representation of the field's value, if a value is defined. If you do not want to update the stored value, this attribute should be passed back unchanged.

inherited.description: Whether this field is inherited from its parent instance. If true, the value/encrypted value properties become read-only. The default value is false.

name.description: The name of the configuration field.

value.description: The value for the configuration field. For encrypted or hashed fields, GETs will not return this attribute. To update an encrypted or hashed field, specify the new value in this attribute.

ConfigRow.description: A row of configuration values for a plugin configuration table.

defaultRow.description: Whether this row is the default.

fields.description: The configuration fields in the row.

ConfigTable.description: A plugin configuration table populated with values.

inherited.description: Whether this table is inherited from its parent instance. If true, the rows become read-only. The default value is false.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

HashedTextFieldDescriptor.description: A text field that will contain a secure salted hash.

advanced.description: Whether this is an advanced field or not.

label.description: Label of the field to be displayed in the administrative console.

required.description: Whether a value is required for this field or not.

size.description: The size of the text field.

id.description:
The ID of the plugin instance. The ID cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

name.description:
The plugin instance name. The name cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

parentRef.description:
The reference to this plugin's parent instance. The parent reference is only accepted if the plugin type supports parent instances.
Note: This parent reference is required if this plugin instance is used as an overriding plugin (e.g. connection adapter overrides)

pluginDescriptorRef.description:
Reference to the plugin descriptor for this instance. The plugin descriptor cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

attributeContract.description: The attribute contract for this plugin.

className.description: Full class name of the class that implements this plugin.

configDescriptor.description: The descriptor which defines the configuration fields available for this plugin.

supportsExtendedContract.description: Determines whether this plugin supports extending the attribute contract.

NotificationPublisherDescriptors.description: A collection of notification publisher plugin descriptors.

items.description: The list of notification publisher plugin descriptors.

NotificationPublishers.description: A collection of notification publisher plugin instances.

items.description: The list of notification publisher plugin instances.

defaultNotificationPublisherRef.description: Reference to the default notification publisher, if one is defined.

OptionValue.description: An option name and value associated with a selection field.

value.description: The value associated with this option.

PluginConfigDescriptor.description: Defines the configuration fields available for a plugin.

actionDescriptors.description: The available actions for this plugin.

fields.description: The configuration fields available for this plugin.

tables.description: Configuration tables available for this plugin.

PluginConfiguration.description: Configuration settings for a plugin instance.

PluginDescriptor.description: Defines a plugin type, including available configuration parameters.

attributeContract.description: The attribute contract for this plugin.

className.description: Full class name of the class that implements this plugin.

configDescriptor.description: The descriptor which defines the configuration fields available for this plugin.

supportsExtendedContract.description: Determines whether this plugin supports extending the attribute contract.

id.description:
The ID of the plugin instance. The ID cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

name.description:
The plugin instance name. The name cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.

parentRef.description:
The reference to this plugin's parent instance. The parent reference is only accepted if the plugin type supports parent instances.
Note: This parent reference is required if this plugin instance is used as an overriding plugin (e.g. connection adapter overrides)

pluginDescriptorRef.description:
Reference to the plugin descriptor for this instance. The plugin descriptor cannot be modified once the instance is created.
Note: Ignored when specifying a connection's adapter override.
